results.name: hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids
results.label: Business units
results.description: The business units this record is assigned to.

results.name: hs_at_mentioned_owner_ids
results.label: At-Mentioned Owner Ids
results.description: The owners that have been at-mentioned on the engagement

results.name: hs_attachment_ids
results.label: Attached file IDs
results.description: The IDs of the files that are attached to the engagement

results.name: hs_body_preview
results.label: Body preview
results.description: A truncated preview of the engagegement body

results.name: hs_body_preview_html
results.label: HTML Body Preview
results.description: The HTML representation of the engagement body preview

results.name: hs_body_preview_is_truncated
results.label: Body Preview Truncated
results.description: Indicates if the engagement body was truncated for the preview

results.name: hs_created_by
results.label: Activity created by
results.description: The user who created the engagement

results.name: hs_created_by_user_id
results.label: Created by user ID
results.description: The user that created this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_createdate
results.label: Create date
results.description: The date that an engagement was created

results.name: hs_engagement_source
results.label: Engagement Source
results.description: The source that created this engagement

results.name: hs_engagement_source_id
results.label: Engagement Source ID
results.description: The specific ID of the process that created this engagement

results.name: hs_follow_up_action
results.label: Follow up action
results.description: What action should be performed during follow up

results.name: hs_gdpr_deleted
results.label: GDPR deleted
results.description: Indicates the body of this engagement has been cleared because of a GDPR delete request

results.name: hs_lastmodifieddate
results.label: Last modified date
results.description: The date any property on this engagement was modified

results.name: hs_merged_object_ids
results.label: Merged object IDs
results.description: The list of object IDs that have been merged into this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_modified_by
results.label: Updated by
results.description: The user who last updated the engagement

results.name: hs_note_body
results.label: Note body
results.description: The body of the note

results.name: hs_object_id
results.label: Object ID
results.description: The unique ID for this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_product_name
results.label: Product name
results.description: The name of the product associated with this engagement

results.name: hs_queue_membership_ids
results.label: Queue Memberships
results.description: The list of queues that contain this engagement

results.name: hs_timestamp
results.label: Activity date
results.description: The date that an engagement occurred

results.name: hs_unique_creation_key
results.label: Unique creation key
results.description: Unique property used for idempotent creates

results.name: hs_unique_id
results.label: Unique ID
results.description: The unique ID of the engagement

results.name: hs_updated_by_user_id
results.label: Updated by user ID
results.description: The user that last updated this object. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_followers
results.label: User IDs of all notification followers
results.description: The user IDs of all users that have clicked follow within the object to opt-in to getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_notification_unfollowers
results.label: User IDs of all notification unfollowers
results.description: The user IDs of all object owners that have clicked unfollow within the object to opt-out of getting follow notifications

results.name: hs_user_ids_of_all_owners
results.label: User IDs of all owners
results.description: The user IDs of all owners of this object

results.name: hubspot_owner_assigneddate
results.label: Owner Assigned Date
results.description: The timestamp when an owner was assigned to this engagement

results.name: hubspot_owner_id
results.label: Activity assigned to
results.description: The user that the activity is assigned to in HubSpot. This can be any HubSpot user or Salesforce integration user, and can be set manually or via Workflows.

results.name: hubspot_team_id
results.label: HubSpot Team
results.description: The team of the owner of an engagement.

results.name: hs_all_owner_ids
results.label: All owner ids
results.description: The value of all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: hs_all_team_ids
results.label: All team ids
results.description: The team ids corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom

results.name: hs_all_accessible_team_ids
results.label: All accessible team ids
results.description: The team ids, including up the team hierarchy, corresponding to all owner referencing properties for this object, both default and custom
